name: GetPlayerCameraFrontVector
notes:
In 0.3a the camera front vector is only obtainable when player is inside a rhino, S.W.A.T tank, fire truck, or on foot.
Since 0.3b the camera data can be obtained when the player is in any vehicle or on foot.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: This function will return the current direction of player's aiming in 3-D space, the coords are relative to the camera position, see GetPlayerCameraPos.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player you want to obtain the camera front vector of

params_body.name: Float:x
params_body.description: A float to store the X coordinate, passed by reference.

params_body.name: Float:y
params_body.description: A float to store the Y coordinate, passed by reference.

params_body.name: Float:z
params_body.description: A float to store the Z coordinate, passed by reference.

return_values: The position is stored in the specified variables.
related_fn: GetPlayerCameraPos: Find out where the player's camera is.
